entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
